name: Álvaro Luque
tagLine: Writing software cleaner and more efficient every day.
summary: Hello! I'm Alvaro Luque, a software engineer from Spain with a passion for technology, problem-solving, and continuous self-improvement. I love building tools to solve my everyday challenges—whether it's a small script or a full-scale web application.

I graduated with a degree in Computer Science in 2024 and have been working at Entrust as a software engineer since my final year of studies. Currently, I'm developing an internal-use chatbot, where I'm continuously applying and refining my skills in a collaborative environment with high-quality standards.
Outside of work, I enjoy reading and taking walks with my dog. These moments help me unwind and stay focused to give my best throughout the day and keep on learning new things.
